title: Hate incidents since election tapering off, now top 700 in online survey
description: Incidents of racial hate and other forms of discrimination since the election now top 700 in an anecdotal survey being conducted by he Southern Poverty Law Center, though the frequency of reports has declined significantly since the immediate aftermath of Donald Trump's election.

title: IMPORTANT INVESTOR ALERT
description: Lundin Law PC Announces Securities Class Action Lawsuit against Xerox Corporation and Reminds Investors with Losses to Contact the Firm

title: American Airlines (AAL) Has Been Soaring Since Earnings, Can It Continue?
description: A month has gone by since the last earnings report for American Airlines (AAL). Shares have added about 18 % in the past month, easily outpacing the S&P 500 in that time frame.

title: What's Next for Microsoft (MSFT) Stock?
description: Microsoft  reported first-quarter fiscal 2017 earnings adjusted for Windows 10 deferrals and currency effect of $0.76 per share, which comfortably surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.68.
